cd ../../../data/Satpathy2019/PBMC_Rep1_scATAC/01_fragment_files
bgzip -d GSM3722015_PBMC_Rep1_liftOverhg38_sorted_fragments.tsv.gz -@ 10


## remove chrM

sed '/^chrM/d' GSM3722015_PBMC_Rep1_liftOverhg38_sorted_fragments.tsv > GSM3722015_PBMC_Rep1_liftOverhg38_sorted_fragments_no_chrMt.sort.bed

# bgzip and tabix

bgzip -k  GSM3722015_PBMC_Rep1_liftOverhg38_sorted_fragments_no_chrMt.sort.bed -@ 10

tabix -p bed GSM3722015_PBMC_Rep1_liftOverhg38_sorted_fragments_no_chrMt.sort.bed.gz
